document_data.name: Shard Shunners
document_data.mainbody: The '''Shard Shunners''' were a gang of [[halfling]] [[wererat]]s operating in [[Waterdeep]] in the late 15{{th}} century DR. Their name came from their refusal to deal in [[silver]], called [[Shard (coin)|shards]] in Waterdeep, because of their wererat nature.
document_data.Activities:
The Shard Shunners committed petty crimes around the city. Around [[1492 DR]],{{WDH-time}} they were pickpocketing patrons at the [[Endshift Tavern]] in the [[Field Ward]] as retribution for a disagreement between the tavern owner and one of their members.

They were hired by [[Emmek Frewn]] to harass a group of adventurers. The adventurers had reopened [[Trollskull Tavern]], a bar that he had personally tried to buy but was outbid. He opened his own establishment nearby, [[Frewn's Brews]], and felt that the Tavern was too near to his own business.
document_data.Base of Operations: The gang operated from a halfling-owned hostel on [[Spices Street]] in the [[Dock Ward]].
document_data.Relationships: There was a tenuous alliance between the Shard Shunners and the [[Xanathar's Thieves' Guild]]. The hostel that served as a base of operations for the Shard Shunners shared a cellar entrance to [[Waterdeep/Sewers|the sewers]] very near to one of the Xanathar's underground hideouts.
